message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! It's a one-of-a-kind item that I'm sure you'll love. I'm willing to let it go for $120.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $90. Can you meet me at that price?
I appreciate your interest in the product, Bob! However, I'm afraid $90 is a bit too low for me. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $110, but I'm not willing to go any lower than that.
I appreciate your flexibility, but $110 is still a bit too high for me. I'm willing to pay $95 for the product. Can you meet me at that price?

I understand you're trying to get a good deal, Bob, but I'm not comfortable going below $105. I'm willing to meet you halfway between $110 and $95, which is $102.50, but I can do a bit better than that. I'm willing to meet you at $105
I'm getting close to my budget, but $105 is still a bit too high for me. I'm willing to pay $98 for the product. Can you meet me at that price?

I'm starting to think we're getting close to a deal, Bob! I can see you're making a serious effort to get to a price you're comfortable with. I'm willing to make one more concession. I can meet you at $102, but that's as low as I'm willing to go.
